title: nindikkalAmO
sahitya:
nindikkalAmO manamE engum niraivAna paramanin uruvAna ulagai nI


anupallavi

  enda jAti matamum enda niramum illA Ekarasa shuddhAnmAdEgiyenr-arindapin


caraNam    nIr pani Avi pOl mOr neyyum pAlum pOL nilam payir jalamum pOl pala vidhamAik-kalandE
Or paramAtmanaE uyirkkuyirAnadai uNarnd-uLLAra orumaiyuNDAna pinbu
